description: Boasting a splendid location with an outdoor dining space on a kind of raft-cum-platform, this restaurant boasts one of the most delightful views in Venice, with the Giudecca on the opposite side ...
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Interesting wine list, Terrace, Wheelchair access
